short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Ruby Toolbox data on Rubygems.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension pulls information from the Ruby Toolbox (https://www.ruby-toolbox.com/) to display on rubygems.org.

For example, if you're viewing a gem like simplecov at https://rubygems.org/gems/simplecov, it will pull the information from the Ruby Toolbox that it is "A long-lived project that still receives updates". Other gems will display other information based on the metrics that the Ruby Toolbox collects.
